title: "first-website"
---

```{r}
#| output: false
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
```


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| label: car-plot
mtcars %>%
select(mpg, wt) %>%
ggplot(aes(x=wt, y=mpg)) +
geom_point() +
geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula=y~x, se=FALSE) +
theme_clean() +
labs(title="Fuel Efficiency and Weight",
     subtitle="heavier cars are less fuel efficient",
     x="Weight",
     y="MPG")
```
